summary: In Shinto religion, in order to make something sacred, man will tie a rope around it. This sacred quality of the tying can be applied also to Kinbaku, which is an erotic, spiritual, artistic connection between the people who are doing it
cast: Steve Osada|Ageha Asagi|Haruki Yukimura|Shuhei Kitagawa|Kurumi Mira|Hajime Kinoko|Ben Kamras
title: Kinbaku
